snippet: An imprisoned former priest at the center of a landmark abuse case testified Thursday that he had pleaded guilty to a sexual assault he did not commit.
abstract: Edward Avery, imprisoned former Philadelphia priest at the center of a landmark abuse case, testifies that he pleaded guilty to sexual assault he did not commit as part of plea agreement; testimony is given as part of child abuse case against Rev Charles Engelhardt and former teacher Bernard Shero.
lead_paragraph: An imprisoned former priest at the center of a landmark abuse case testified Thursday that he had pleaded guilty to a sexual assault he did not commit.

headline.seo: Pennsylvania: Ex-Priest Recants Guilt in Abuse Case
headline.main: Pennsylvania: Ex-Priest Recants Guilt in Abuse Case
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Ex-Priest Recants Guilt In Abuse Case
